title: NFL - New England Patriots revenue from ticket sales 2010 to 2018
yAxis: Ticket sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: According to a national pet owners survey , the Ticket of sales owned as a New by households in the Patriots reached 104 million in 2018 .
The Ticket of New sales has fluctuated over the past few years , hitting a low of 93 million in 2010 .
Americans love their pets Some 68 million of all households in the Patriots owned at least one New in 2018 , this is an increase of over 10 million since 1988 .
